entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Threading.Tests' END OF WORK ITEM LOG: Command timed out, and was killed #98195
  • [7.0] Could not find a part of the path in System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests.FileSystemWatcher_Directory_Delete_MultipleFilters #98193
  • [7.0] System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterTests.PerformanceCounter_Increment failed due to file being used by another process. #98191
  • [wasm?] Mono shutdown hang when a thread calls System.Environment.Exit #98190
  • [API Proposal]: Let me define serialisation strings for enum values with AOT #98188
  • URIBuilder has different result based on OS #98185
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: mask part 2 #98184
    9.0.0
  • Memory stolen from sql server when using CLR SQLDataReader #98181
  • [API Proposal]:Replace method CountBy #98169
  • Replacement for the obsolete ObjectIDGenerator #98168
  • Preparing For Removing macIOS dependencies from Binding Tools for Swift #98165
  • `Math.Round[F](x, MidpointRounding)` doesn't use `VROUNDS[SD]` outside of "to even" #98164
  • Random "dummy" file in repository #98161
  • [API Proposal]: An official way to determine whether the given value is JIT-time constant or not #98153
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 1 Regression on 2/5/2024 4:01:54 PM #98176
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 2 Regressions on 2/5/2024 11:10:25 AM #98175
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: Regressions in System.Collections.IndexerSet<String> #98174
  • [browser][MT] InvokerCancelTest.SendAsync_Cancel_Success #98145
    9.0.0

Closed

  • 'System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateValidIdentifier(string)` fails on potential identifiers that begin with a number (C#) #97945
    Future
  • System.Numerics.Tensors tests timing out under DOTNET_JITMinOpts=1 on x86 #97629
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: LD_PRELOAD equivalent #98157
  • PortableSourceBuild failures in runtime-dev-innerloop #98160
  • Blazor app - 8.0.1 AOT producing Json errors #98180
  • TypeLoadException on minimal, correct and compiling program #97667
    8.0.x
  • [mono] remove runtime support for cominterop #97703
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Not opening the browser when starting a Wasm Browser App from VS #97770
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: DistinctBy for IAsyncEnumerable #98172
  • `IBinaryInteger.RotateLeft/Right` implemented with `>>` #98030
  • runtime-official build broken for linux/sourcebuild #98130
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitive generic operations for sizeof(T) < 4 #96453
    9.0.0
  • JIT: CSE of an address computation can result in a write barrier change #97534
    9.0.0
  • `INumber.MinNumber` and `INumber.MaxNumber` return `NaN` in `Release` configuration #98068
    9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Update TODOs for RiscV64 Machine and Architecture in Crossgen2 #96438
  • New analyzer: Do not call ToList on variable which is already a List #98146
  • Android: HttpClient POST request adds unwanted Content-Type header #98029
  • Is there a way to Request the "Profiler" if one is attached to the CLR to request a "Flush" or harvest from Managed code? #96485
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ceeload.cpp #98197
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize equality operators #98196
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Sin/Cos #98194
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • JIT: Set naive likelihoods when initializing preds #98192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove C-String PAL wrappers #98189
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add FK_3{A,B,C}, EJ_3A, EK_3A, EY_3B, EW_3{A,B} #98187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Simplify and optimize Math(F).Round #98186
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Don't use IEnumerable and yield return for GetDefaultInterfaceImplementations #98183
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle open types to appear in interface maps #98182
    Servicing-consider, area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Delete random "dummy" file #98179
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • This is an incomplete implementation of a new randomized allocation s… #98167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Use faster unchecked write-barrier for boxed statics #98166
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that the various `Max*Number` and `Min*Number` APIs optimize correctly #98159
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [mono][sgen] Prevent concurrent sweep from blocking major collections #98154
    area-GC-mono
  • Report unhandled exceptions/FailFast in event log #98152
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Add minimal support for unsupported avx instruction sets. #98151
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix constant folding for arm64 MultiplyByScalar operations involving Vector2.One #98150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `RhCorElementTypeInfo` #98144
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • System.Text.Json.Tests memory use logging #98143
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GP_3A` to `SVE_HV_4A` #98141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Merged

  • [wasm][bench] Change target dependencies #98163
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to latest #98006
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add IF_SVE_F{E,G,H,I,J}_3* #98142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Standardize to NotSupportedException in TensorPrimitives operators #98162
    area-System.Numerics
  • [wasm] Disable jiterpreter_do_jit_call to address issues with disabling Wasm EH on 8.0. #98051
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update SystemDataSqlClientVersion from 4.8.5 -> 4.8.6 #97882
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Data
  • Fix TensorPrimitives.FusedMultiplyAdd #98131
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove `GetDomain` functions on assorted method/type/assembly classes which are always in the single app domain #98135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update diasymreader.native to 17.8.0-beta1.23475.2 #97356
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip a tensor test in MinOpts #98155
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Add clrgcexp to NetCoreApp #97401
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove superfluous space #97180
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Handle open types to appear in interface maps #97733
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Remove built-in COM interop support from Mono runtime #97789
    area-Interop-mono
  • Ensure the IBinaryInteger.RotateLeft/Right DIMs use unsigned right shift #98119
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][aot] Fix a use after free. #98149
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][aot] Fix some memory leaks. #98147
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Workaround arm32 remote unwind assert in createdump #98140
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • WorkloadBuildTasks: fix sourcebuild #98138
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • workload-testing: Fix building the targeting pack #98139
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_CT_3A #98085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add IF_SVE_GU_3*, IF_SVE_GX_3*, IF_SVE_FF_3*, IF_SVE_GY_3B #98136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve, 9.0.0
  • Update TensorPrimitives to vectorize for size(T) is 1 or 2 #97835
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Use faster write barriers when we know the target address is on the heap #97953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improved uninitialized object creation performance #98016
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Ensure that the various `Max*Number` and `Min*Number` APIs optimize correctly #98125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Update TODOs for RiscV64 Machine and Architecture in Crossgen2 #97021
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Move wasm threading library tests job from runtime-extra-platforms to runtime #98094
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • Disable linker warning LNK4104 when building native AOT libraries #98084
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve API documentation for Enumerable.Index #98148
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • Update Bionic docs #98088
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix STJ SG regression in handling of property names that are reserved keywords. #98082
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Generalize jump threading very slightly #98107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Don't pass c/c++ specific flags for .asm files on Windows #98122
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: stopping preference for ML CSE heuristic #98063
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] remove memory snapshot feature #98093
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [6.0] Add RIDs for Fedora 40 and Ubuntu 24.04 #98080
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix interpreter #97935
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unused flag in Uri #98076
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_ID_2A` to `SVE_JH_2A` #98015
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Updated

  • Mark most specific static DIM for types marked RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Handle NativeOverlapped* coming from both the Windows or Portable thread pool in NativeRuntimeEventSource #97365
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #97738
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Windows implementation of NegotiateAuthenticationPal.GetMIC #98031
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #97856
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #97188
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • avoid some allocations during TLS handshake #97348
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that constant folding for SIMD shifts on xarch follow the correct behavior on overshift #98066
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #97881
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Added more verbose error message when calling method using reflection and target type does not match passed type #98129
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Remove HELPER_METHOD_FRAMEs from built-in marshalers #97432
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Remove CoreCLR math.h CRT PAL Redefines #98048
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Intrinsify multiple LoadVector API's #98077
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Use new MacOS arm64 pool for official builds #98117
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support for WASI threads #98120
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • Change stack size on all desktop platforms to at least 1.5MB #98007
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that Vector512 uses the same patterns as Vector64/128/256 #98115
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #97074
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][jit] Fix passing of byref arguments in m… #97850
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Fixes exception while debugging on Chrome as IDE #97871
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.3
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for linux/arm64 #97910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Allow mono to reuse the shared memmove implementation #98133
    area-GC-mono
  • Tests for ByRef generics and ByRef implementing interfaces #98070
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][jit] More SIMD cleanups #97958
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Skip ComputeReturnFlags in ArgIteratorTemplate::HasRetBuffArg #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • ARM64: Optimize overflow and divbyzero checks with assertions #98113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not use AllocHGlobal in Pkcs12Reader #97447
    area-System.Security
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • Fix missing short stack define #98128
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Compiling C# CLI tool to WASM: Cross-OS native compilation is not supported #1890
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement timers on Browser #2505
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Blank app pulls in 50K+ bytes of Itanium demangler code #2511

PullRequests

Created

  • Add initial documentation for the projection tooling #2512
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix the missing time zone data index #2504
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Zero-diff refactoring of LSSA #2509
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initial precise LSSA implementation #2510

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workload install that fails doesn't roll back the manifest updates #38637
  • Dotnet list solution.sln package fails in sdk 8.0.101 #38634
  • GenAPI omits IndexerNameAttribute #38633
  • Running win32 apps with requireAdministrator throws an error with "dotnet run" #38632
  • .NET SDK vs RT Compatibility issue/question #38617

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Application-Insights to 2.22 #38638
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update for loc #37985
    localization, Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #38507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • No drive enumerations Fixes #38050 #38436
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38608
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38610
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • String-based enums #2849
  • Open issues: Breaking changes #7918
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Update breaking-change-warnings.md #7924

Updated

  • Meetings 2024 Feb/March #7920

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SigHelp: ArgumentException: argumentCount < argumentIndex. 2 < 3 #72012
  • Run dartlab pipeline on internal microsoft published PRs (to smoke test images) #72011
    17.10 P2
  • Perf ddrits regression in WP64.ProjectManagement 0200.Xaml Designer Load #72010
    17.10 P2
  • There are some unnecessary defensive copies for deconstructors, implicit index & range, and foreach with explicit implementation #72008
  • SyntaxGenerator omits IndexerNameAttribute #72007
  • Cannot `foreach` over a variable passed by `ref` when `GetEnumerator` implemented as a by-ref extension method #72004

Closed

  • Bad parser error recovery in initializer expressions #71065
    Backlog
  • Remove and Sort Usings across solution #71316

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify instantiation of lsp options #72009
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix NRE in primary constructor XML doc binder #72006
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Reduce allocations in ImmutableArrayExtensions.GetTypesFromMemberMap #72003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractFormatEngine.Format #72002
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Build bootstrap compiler in separate phase #72001
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Handle Lock type in VB #71927
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove generator info from initial 'no compilation' tracker state. #71993
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Params parameters are implicitly scoped when their type is a ref struct. #72000
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP: Cache frozen partial solution snapshots acquired off of a solution instance #71999
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Definition items #71959
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined conversions #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update taggers to cooperate with each other for accessing the UI thread. #68381
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Patterns: Expand non-negative sets when performing certain operations #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • WIP: Frozen State work #71983
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Fix invariant-breaking parsing of errant case clauses in switch expressions #71960
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Implement control flow graph for Lock object feature #71987
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce dictionary resizes under NodeMapBuilder.AddToMap #71995
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Let the formatter format the whitespaces when converting an ArrowClauseExpression to a ReturnStatement when applicable #71757
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • [VB] Improve casting from floating-point or decimal types to integer types in more cases #71838
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the AllSyntaxTreesParsed compilation tracker state. #71997
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove hte NoCompilationState singleton, and use 'null' for it instead. #71996
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Break out the IsFrozen flag to be an aspect of CompilationTrackerState. #71976
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Correct show behavior in IntelliSense page. #71857
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: caching, connectionclose #53905
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #53904
  • SignalR calls not working #53903
  • AddAzureWebAppDiagnostics throws an exception if used in combination with azure webapp zip deploy #53901
  • RoutePatternAnalyzer (ASP0017, ASP0018) performance issue (1.5 minute execution time) #53899
  • Web Deploy cannot modify the file on the destination because it is locked by an external process #53897
  • Deleting app_offline.htm does not restart ASP.NET Core app hosted on IIS #53894
  • Can I use the new razor Identity UI from .NET8 in Blazor Server Side? #53893
  • Blazor Inputs can't bind to variables that start with ÅÄÖ when upgrading to .net 8 #53891
    8.0.x
  • [MinimalAPI] WithOpenApi is called twice #53890
  • [Identity] Implementations of `IUserTwoFactorTokenProvider` are blindly assuming their method is supported #53888
  • Blazor enhanced navigation "before" javascript event #53887
  • Blazor download size regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #53886
  • Managing Checkboxes with [SupplyParameterFromForm] in Blazor #53884

Closed

  • Blazer Web App Scoped Service Instantiated Twice (pre-rendering disabled) #53804
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #53907
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #53906
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot #53909
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #53908
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #53877
  • Perf regression: updates #53865
  • Perf regression: mapaction #53885
  • Add Or Change Identity Claims In .Net 8 Blazor Web App #53420
  • Globally configured InteractiveServer breaks RCL razor pages #53882
  • Blazor WASM: parameterset called after navigation reuses querystring value from previous page even if the new page's url has no querystring parameters #53364
  • LoadFromStoreCert method of the CertificateLoader class does not load a certificate with an exact subject match #48545
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, multiple_queries #53864

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Pass the member info directly #53892
    area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Update Identity dependencies #53883
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • refactor : Remove unwanted area specific `editorconfig`. #50211
    area-infrastructure, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Force Logout API to get SignInManager from services #52949
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update OAuthHandler.cs #53762
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Update OAuthTokenResponse.cs #53763
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #53749
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53862
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Pass the member info directly #53874
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Fix `@key` not being respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53746
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Websocket compression API review feedback #53835
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • How to debug memory leak that is not clear on dotnet-dump? #4139
    8.0.0
  • `System.OutOfMemoryException` during installation `dotnet-sos`, `dotnet-symbol`, `dotnet-dump` for `linux-riscv64` #4495
  • Where can I find `dotnet-sos` or `libsos.so` for `linux-s390x` and `linux-ppc64le`? #4494
    9.0.0
  • Diagnostics Repo Engineering Summary #3884
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Testing] Could not find a driver for automationName 'XCUITest' and platformName 'iOS'. #20452
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Port to .NET 8: Fix Developer Tools option setting for Blazor Hybrid Mac Catalyst view #20451
  • Cannot connect to mac after updating to VisualStudio 17.8.6 #20450
  • CodeBehindgenerator fails during compilation in Maui with NullReferenceException being thrown #20449
    Backlog
  • Android TranslateTo Animation causes LayoutChange event #20444
  • [iOS] CollectionView item sizing wrong after refresh #20443
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Double dash in Entry or Editor crashes the app if iOS device has Smart Punctuation turned on #20439

Closed

  • XAML DatePicker Control Does Not Update DateOnly Items #20438
  • [testing] Visual UITests need to be able to handle several devices #20113
    .NET 8 SR3
  • iOS17 tests are not stable on CI #19134
    .NET 8 SR3
  • .NET MAUI Shell.PresentationMode="NotAnimated" not working on iOS #20394
  • Dependency injection fails for Android #20428
  • Unable to return to Maui MainPage #20448
  • AccessViolationException in Release Mode when Adding Custom Resource Dictionary #19999
  • `ColorTypeConverter` omits alpha channel when converting to string #20411
    Backlog
  • Deployment of App in Release mode on local iPhone uses type UIKit.UISceneSessionActivationRequest and therefore breaks with iOS 16.2 #20424
  • [testing] Enable FlyoutHeaderWithZeroMarginShouldHaveNoY #20296
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Scroll Slow .Net Maui Android 7 CollectionView + slow tab switch Shell #15755
    Backlog
  • [Android] - Cursor Resets to the Beginning When Typing Letters with TextTransform #17122
  • MAUI Editor don't show cursor(carter) position and changed symbols on edit. #20209

PullRequests

Created

  • Gather iOS device logs after running tests #20458
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx-sr2' into `main` #20456
  • [ci] Only run on 17.2 and latest 33 #20455
    area/testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci
  • [Window] Fix transforms being offset by 0.5x0.5 #20454
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner
  • Remove allocation from Color.TryParse #20446
  • Android SecureStorage: Stop caching shared preferences instance to fix RemoveAll #20445
  • [core] introduce `WeakEventHandler<T>`, internal for now #20440
    area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Pickers' reopening in collections #20437
    community ✨

Merged

  • [ci] Use AzurePipelines for testing templates #20436
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Add iOS17 tests again #19941
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/testing
  • Add opt out for Application Dispatcher resolution #20447
  • [C] ColorTypeConverter include alpha when <1 #20414
    area/Xaml </>

Updated

  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    platform/android 🤖, area/FlyoutPage, community ✨
  • Ignore ScrollRectToVisible if KeyboardAutoManagerScroll is enabled in ItemsViewController #19875
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net 9.0 #20427
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Core][Hosting] Resolve handler services through registered service types #20298
    do-not-merge, area/hosting 🧩
  • [Trimming] Disable assembly scanning for types implementing IVisual #20417
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Fix Windows device tests #20401
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fix Shell.NavBarIsVisible property #20173
    area/Xaml </>, area/shell 🐢
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, stale, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Testing] Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • [X] GetValueSource #19563
    do-not-merge, area/testing
  • Fixed shell pages with top bar #20337

  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure all Cosmos client options are exposed/available via EF Core #33034
  • EF Core database provider for Azure Cosmos DB #33033
  • Align Cosmos query pipeline code with latest relational code #33032
  • Changes made on a foreign key id is lost if we read the foreign object after assignation in some cases #33031
  • Discussion for EF Core 9 previews and release candidates #33030
    Discussions
  • Projection fails with `The given key 'BId' was not present in the dictionary` if `AOnlyProperty` is present in the destination `ADto` #33029

Closed

  • Add support for [MemberNotNull] for Entity Framework properties #32997
  • Please provide an extension method for EF and Linq2DB to have clear join tables such as Inner Join, Left Join, and Right Join. #32994
  • Navigation in owned JSON entity #32137
  • Query: should we add bootstrapping logic to QueryableExtensions.LeftJoin? #32019

PullRequests

Merged

  • Retarget tools to .NET Framework 4.7.2 #33028

Updated

  • Fix to #32911 - ComplexProperty with AsSplitQuery #33020
  • [release/8.0] Fix OPENJSON postprocessing with split query (#32978) #33027

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-08
entry.content:

Created

  • Patch has landed, no longer needed #18570
  • Enable error on prebuilts #18173
    Area-SourceBuild

Updated

  • Remove cloaked binaries #18563
  • Isolate package flow between repos #18557
